description: SB facing UTG open â€” very tight defense, mostly 3-bet or fold, occasional cold-call with suited hands.
theory: SB faces the tightest opening range in 6-max. Cold-calling is often suboptimal due to OOP play, so SB's flat range is narrow. 3-betting is preferred with strong hands.

call.notes: Cold-calling OOP vs UTG is marginal. Only very playable suited hands or pairs that don't want to 3-bet.

threeBet.notes: Strong 3-bet range for value. Bluff 3-bets rare vs UTG.
